Class Operations

  • java.lang.Object
    • Operations

  • public class Operations
extends java.lang.Object
    The Polynomial class represents a class which defines a List of Monomials. It supports multiple operations like: - getStatus () - returns the status of poly (ready or not) - getSize () - returns the number of elements of poly - getMonomial (int i) - returns monomial on position i in poly - simplifyMe () - adds coefficients of monomials having the same degree - toString () - returns the stringified poly - get/setVariable () - get/set the variable name of the poly - add (Monomial m) - adds Monomial m to poly - getPoly () - returns the poly
    Author:
    Alexandru Bondor
